alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 3:58PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN JEWELL COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lovewell State Park, or 23 miles west of Belleville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lovewell State Park around 405 PM CDT. Webber around 415 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
